level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 21-1114, ยง 21-1115, ยง 21-2002, and ยง 21-2203.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Section 17(a) of D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "Citizens with Intellectual Disabilities" for "Mentally Retarded Persons" in the subtitle heading.
Section 17(b) of D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "Rights of Citizens with Intellectual Disabilities" for "Mentally Retarded Citizens" in the chapter heading.
